comments.body: There's nothing wrong with this although you could just say 'for drags in any direction'
It's not so much that they're in a particular direction with Pan, it's that they literally can go in multiple directions.

(this comment should be on line 85, but github doesn't allow me to comment there) Can you add something to the doc for `onStart` that references this property here, so people who look there find this?
